# show_string_network { #geneinfo.string.show_string_network }

```python
geneinfo.string.show_string_network(my_genes, nodes=10)
```

Display STRING network for a list of genes.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

<code>[**my_genes**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[Union](`typing.Union`)\[[list](`list`), [str](`str`)\]]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   List of gene symbols

<code>[**nodes**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[int](`int`)]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [10]{.parameter-default}</code>

:   Number of nodes to show, by default 10
